solution_line_template: There are {initial_people} - {people_quit} = <<{initial_people}-{people_quit}={after_quit}>>{after_quit} people in their dance team after {people_quit} people quit.
Therefore, there are {after_quit} + {new_people} = <<{after_quit}+{new_people}={final_people}>>{final_people} people now after {new_people} new people got in.
